description: Run all project tests to ensure no regressions were introduced.
instructions: Execute the command `pytest` in the terminal from the project root directory.
Monitor the output of the command to ensure all tests pass.
constraints: The test execution must complete without errors.
validation_criteria: The output of the `pytest` command indicates '== X passed in Y.ZZs ==' where X is the total number of tests and Y.ZZ is the execution time.
No test failures or errors are reported in the output.
name: run_all_tests
